Course_Name: Sustainable Energy in Remote and Displacement Settings

Messages.Author: Anne van Leeuwen
Messages.Content: Dear students, Yesterday, we held a short session on the requirements of the final paper for this seminar. You will find the slides of my presentation in the materials for this week. Contrary to what was earlier communicated, the final deadline for the paper is 31 August 2024 at 23:59. The paper should be sent as pdf via email to a.van.leeuwen@tu-berlin.de I'm looking forward to receiving and reading your papers.  Regards, Anne

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Seminar tomorrow: no in-person meeting and assignment

Messages.Author: Anne van Leeuwen
Messages.Content: Dear students, Tomorrow, we will not have our regular in-person seminar session. Instead, I added a folder of UNHCR case studies to the course materials for tomorrow. Please read these case studies and they will be discussed in the seminar next week. Kind regards, Anne van Leeuwen, Research Associate

Messages.Author: Boris Heinz
Messages.Content: Dear students, it is very unfortunate, but we have to cancel our seminar tomorrow. I apologise for the short notice. Our next seminar will therefore take place on 5 June 2024. I look forward to it. Best regards, Boris

Messages.Author: Anne van Leeuwen
Messages.Content: Dear students, In the folder for the session of 17 April, you can now find a pdf with a list of titles and abstracts of 22 articles that you can use for your individual presentations. Please note that these are merely suggestions, and you are welcome to make your own suggestion for your presentation as well. To that end, the first page of the pdf also includes a list of resources to find more articles on our topic. Once you've decided upon an article for your presentation, please register your presentation in this registration sheet. When you register your slot, please do not forget to remove the article of your choice from the list of articles to choose from on the second tab, so we don't hear about the same article twice. Thank you and have a great day! Anne

Discussions.Discussion_Name: SEEDS SS24 Seminar / change in dates of the seminar

Messages.Author: Boris Heinz
Messages.Content: Dear all, Welcome to the seminar "Sustainable energy concepts in remote and humanitarian contexts".  Unfortunately, the dates of this seminar needs to be changed for this coming summer semester, given conflicting schedules. We apologise for the change. The new dates and times of this seminar are herewith updated, such that the seminar always takes place on  Wednesdays from 10:00-12:00. The room remains the same. We are looking forward to diving into this topic and into discussions with you. Best regards and see you soon, Boris
